title: This past Wednesday approximately 6pm there was a lot of poice action at the front of Churchill Estates off of Grathwol Drive. City, County and State authorities were there surrounding a black car that was smashed in the front. There was a black male and female in handcuffs. There had to be at least 8 police cars, what in the world was going on?
text:
This isn't the type of question we usually answer through
MyReporter, but I will pass this along to the editor who coordinates
law enforcement coverage.
